pkgmetadata.longdescription: # OverviewThis is the official python client for the FalconX API.API Documentation: http://docs.falconx.io# Installation```shpip install falconx```# Quickstart```pythonfrom falconx import FalconxClientclient = FalconxClient(key=KEY, secret=SECRET, passphrase=PASSPHRASE)quote = client.get_quote('BTC', 'USD', 5, 'two_way')result = client.execute_quote(quote['fx_quote_id'], 'buy')```# About FalconXFalconX is an institutional digital asset brokerage.
